languages.text: {n}Лицо Махария краснеет, взбешенный взгляд упирается в вас. Освобожденная ярость закипает с каждым новым словом, сказанным Зауэрбэком.{/n} "Вольный Торговец — это избранный слуга Императора и лучший представитель человечества. Окружив себя грязной скверной — ксеносами, поправшими саму суть исключительности Человечества — вы сами существуете на грани ереси. Никакая свобода, дарованная Императором, не способна обелить это".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Махария краснеет, взбешенный взгляд упирается в вас. Освобожденная ярость закипает с каждым новым словом, сказанным Зауэрбеком.{/n} "Вольный Торговец — это избранный слуга Императора и лучший представитель человечества. Быть может, любой Вольный Торговец, но не вы. Окружив себя грязной скверной, ксеносами, поправшими саму суть исключительности человечества, вы сами существуете на грани ереси, и достойны лишь презрения. Никакая свобода, дарованная Императором, не способна обелить это".

languages.text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. Free-flowing rage boils in every word he says:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is the chosen servant of the Emperor and one of Humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn the very exceptionalism of Humankind, you teeter on the brink of heresy. And no privilege granted by the Emperor can blind others to that fact."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Махария краснеет, взбешенный взгляд упирается в вас. Освобожденная ярость закипает с каждым новым словом, сказанным Зауэрбэком.{/n} "Вольный Торговец — это избранный слуга Императора и лучший представитель человечества. Окружив себя грязной скверной — ксеносами, поправшими саму суть исключительности Человечества — вы сами существуете на грани ереси. Никакая свобода, дарованная Императором, не способна обелить это".

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharias's face turns red, his furious gaze is trained upon you. The free-flowing rage is boiling with every word he says.{/n} The Rogue Trader is a chosen servant of the Emperor and one of humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with filth — the xenos who scorn upon the very uniqueness of the Humanity — you exist on the verge of heresy. And no freedom granted by the Emperor is able to redeem this."

{n}Macharias's face turns red, his furious gaze is trained upon you. The free-flowing rage is boiling with every word he says.{/n} The Rogue Trader is a chosen servant of the Emperor and one of humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with filth — the xenos who scorn upon the very uniqueness of the Humanity — you exist on the verge of heresy. And no freedom granted by the Emperor is able to redeem this."

{n}Macharius' face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. The free-flowing rage is boiling with every word Sauerback says.{/n} The Rogue Trader is a chosen servant of the Emperor and one of humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn upon the very uniqueness of the Humanity, you have straddled the verge of heresy. And no freedom granted by the Emperor is able to redeem this."

{n}Macharius' face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. The free-flowing rage is boiling with every word Sauerback says.{/n} The Rogue Trader is a chosen servant of the Emperor and one of humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn upon the very uniqueness of the Humanity, you have straddled the verge of heresy. And no freedom granted by the Emperor is able to redeem this."

{n}Sauerback's face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. Free-flowing rage boils in every word he says:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is the chosen servant of the Emperor and one of Humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn the very exceptionalism of Humankind, you teeter on the brink of heresy. And no privilege granted by the Emperor can blind others to that fact."

{n}Sauerback's face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. Free-flowing rage boils in every word he says:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is the chosen servant of the Emperor and one of Humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn the very exceptionalism of Humankind, you teeter on the brink of heresy. And no privilege granted by the Emperor can blind others to that fact."

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは顔を真っ赤にして、激しい怒りに満ちた視線をあなたに向ける。その怒りが、彼の一言一句を荒げさせる。{/n}「ローグトレーダーは皇帝に選ばれたしもべであり、人類最高の人間の1人だ。人類の例外性を軽んじる異種族を周囲に置くなど、 異端の縁に立つような行為だ。皇帝から与えられたどのような特権も、その事実を隠すことなどできはしない」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. Free-flowing rage boils in every word he says:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is the chosen servant of the Emperor and one of Humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn the very exceptionalism of Humankind, you teeter on the brink of heresy. And no privilege granted by the Emperor can blind others to that fact."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは顔を真っ赤にして、激しい怒りに満ちた視線をあなたに向ける。その怒りが、彼の一言一句を荒げさせる。{/n}「ローグトレーダーは皇帝に選ばれたしもべであり、人類最高の人間の1人だ。人類の例外性を軽んじる異種族を周囲に置くなど、 異端の縁に立つような行為だ。皇帝から与えられたどのような特権も、その事実を隠すことなどできはしない」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克脸色通红，愤怒地盯着你。他吐出的每个词都燃烧着炽烈的怒火。{/n}“行商浪人乃是神皇所选的忠仆，人类的典范。您甘于堕落，自愿与这些蔑视人类典范与信条的邪恶异形为伍，就已经相当于一只脚踏上了异端的歧路。哪怕您拥有帝皇恩赐的一切特权，也无法让其他人对这样的恶行视而不见。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. Free-flowing rage boils in every word he says:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is the chosen servant of the Emperor and one of Humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn the very exceptionalism of Humankind, you teeter on the brink of heresy. And no privilege granted by the Emperor can blind others to that fact."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克脸色通红，愤怒地盯着你。他吐出的每个词都燃烧着炽烈的怒火。{/n}“行商浪人乃是神皇所选的忠仆，人类的典范。您甘于堕落，自愿与这些蔑视人类典范与信条的邪恶异形为伍，就已经相当于一只脚踏上了异端的歧路。哪怕您拥有帝皇恩赐的一切特权，也无法让其他人对这样的恶行视而不见。”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback s'empourpre, l'air furieux. Chacun de ses mots exsude la rage pure :{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur et la fine fleur de l'humanité. En dépit des privilèges qui lui sont accordés par son seigneur et maître, s'entourer de xénos dépravés qui méprisent la splendeur de notre civilisation est une hérésie et un affront à toutes les valeurs qui nous sont chères. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. Free-flowing rage boils in every word he says:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is the chosen servant of the Emperor and one of Humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn the very exceptionalism of Humankind, you teeter on the brink of heresy. And no privilege granted by the Emperor can blind others to that fact."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback s'empourpre, l'air furieux. Chacun de ses mots exsude la rage pure :{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur et la fine fleur de l'humanité. En dépit des privilèges qui lui sont accordés par son seigneur et maître, s'entourer de xénos dépravés qui méprisent la splendeur de notre civilisation est une hérésie et un affront à toutes les valeurs qui nous sont chères. »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback se vuelve rojo y dirige la furia de su mirada hacia ti. Su furia hierve con cada palabra.{/n} «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente es {mf|el|la} sirviente predilect{mf|o|a} del Emperador, un ejemplo para la Humanidad. Al rodearse de xenos depravados que desprecian la naturaleza excepcional de la misma, sus acciones rayan en la herejía. Ningún privilegio concedido por el Emperador puede impedir que los demás lo veamos».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. Free-flowing rage boils in every word he says:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is the chosen servant of the Emperor and one of Humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn the very exceptionalism of Humankind, you teeter on the brink of heresy. And no privilege granted by the Emperor can blind others to that fact."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback se vuelve rojo y dirige la furia de su mirada hacia ti. Su furia hierve con cada palabra.{/n} «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente es {mf|el|la} sirviente predilect{mf|o|a} del Emperador, un ejemplo para la Humanidad. Al rodearse de xenos depravados que desprecian la naturaleza excepcional de la misma, sus acciones rayan en la herejía. Ningún privilegio concedido por el Emperador puede impedir que los demás lo veamos».

languages.text: {n}Sauerbacks Gesicht färbt sich rot, sein zorniger Blick ist auf dich gerichtet. Jedes seiner Wort ist von blanker Wut beseelt:{/n} "Ein Freihändler ist ein auserwählter Diener des Imperators und gehört zur Elite der Menschheit. Indem Ihr Euch mit verkommenen Xenos umgebt, die auf die Einzigartigkeit der Menschheit spucken, wandelt Ihr auf dem schmalen Grat der Ketzerei. Und kein Privileg des Imperators kann diesen Umstand verschleiern."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. Free-flowing rage boils in every word he says:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is the chosen servant of the Emperor and one of Humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn the very exceptionalism of Humankind, you teeter on the brink of heresy. And no privilege granted by the Emperor can blind others to that fact."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius' Gesicht färbt sich rot, sein zorniger Blick ist allein auf dich gerichtet. Jedes von Sauerbacks Worten trieft nur so vor überkochendem Zorn.{/n} "Ein Freihändler ist ein auserwählter Diener des Imperators und gehört zur Elite der Menschheit. Indem Ihr Euch mit verkommenen Xenos umgebt, die auf die Einzigartigkeit der Menschheit spucken, überquert Ihr die Grenze zur Ketzerei. Und keine Freiheit, die der Imperator Euch gewährt hat, kann das wiedergutmachen."

languages.text: {n}Yüzü kızaran Sauerback, hiddetli bakışlarını sana kenetliyor. Sözleri, köpürmekte olan öfkesini aksettiriyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, İmparator'un seçilmiş hizmetkârı ve İnsanlığın en önde gelenlerindensiniz. Yanınızda İnsanlığın seçkinliğini aşağılayan âciz zenolar bulundurarak kâfirliğin eşiğinde geziyorsunuz. İmparator'un bahşettiği hiçbir ayrıcalık, bu gerçeğin görülmesine mâni olamaz."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback's face turns red, his furious gaze trained upon you. Free-flowing rage boils in every word he says:{/n} "The Rogue Trader is the chosen servant of the Emperor and one of Humanity's best. By surrounding yourself with depraved xenos who scorn the very exceptionalism of Humankind, you teeter on the brink of heresy. And no privilege granted by the Emperor can blind others to that fact."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback'in yüzü kızarıyor, hiddetli bakışları sana kenetlenmiş. Sözleri, köpürmekte olan öfkesini aksettiriyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, İmparator'un seçilmiş hizmetkârı ve İnsanlık'ın en önde gelenlerindensiniz. Yanınızda İnsanlık'ın seçkinliğini aşağılayan âciz zenolar bulundurarak kâfirliğin eşiğinde geziyorsunuz. İmparator'un bahşettiği hiçbir ayrıcalık, bu gerçeğin görülmesine mani olamaz."
